comment.body: You might be able to get around the Great Firewall of China by using https://getlantern.org/.

I am having trouble opening port 15441, despite port forwarding, turning off the router firewall, putting my computer on DMZ mode, and so on, so I make no promises that this will work, but you may be able to download Lantern from me using this address: http://127.0.0.1:43110/17EcoSLuGdJKWrKnBDN1qVsyxN2dZqtJQL/

Please let me know if it works, because I am genuinely curious.
